column4: I would like to dual boot fedora and ubuntu, how should I partition my system? I want to have a common home.
how should I partition my system ?
you would essentially duplicate the /boot, /usr, /var and /tmp for Fedora and Ubuntu and keep the /home the same..
if you really wanted to keep it simple you'd create just 4 partitions in total..a / for Fedora, a / for Ubuntu, a /home and SWAP partiion..both of the last two would be shared..
